ComicInfo.Title: Witch-War Chapter Two: The Psychopomps
ComicInfo.Summary:
"WITCH-WAR" Part Two (of Six): "A Serpent's Tooth": Edward Spellman, trapped in Harvey's body, has been reunited with Madame Satan, who is finally realizing her grand plan of revenge. But Edward has his own dark agenda, and with Sabrina cut off from her aunts, the Spellman ladies are more vulnerable than ever as Round Two of the "Witch-War" commences!!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Robert Hack | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Matthew Southworth | 2 | Note: The digital edition (8/16/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-04 12:25:06. [CVDB615049]
ComicInfo.Characters: Aunt Hilda Spellman, Aunt Zelda Spellman, Cousin Ambrose, Edward Spellman, Harvey Kinkle, Hot Dog, Jughead Jones, Madam Satan, Pop Tate, Sabrina Spellman
